entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Fog patches. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
